messages.message:
Hi team,
Is it possible to pass in an output path to the run ibsolution (https://instabase.com/docs/apis/installed-solution/index.html#request-3) API?
CC @Shubham @Vikesh Chopra
the above output_dir works. Also, @Shubham it is creating the output at same level as input, in a folder named out.
correct, so based upon output_has_run_id, if it is true it will create pattern with run_username/datetime/uuid/out else /out within input directory
